sections.title: Introduction
content: Welcome to Strender! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Strender's Website.

sections.title: Intellectual Property Rights
content: Other than the content you own, under these terms, Strender and/or its licensors own all the intellectual property rights and materials contained in this Website.

sections.title: Restrictions
content: You are specifically restricted from all of the following:
- Publishing any content apart from comments in any other media;
- Selling, sublicensing and/or otherwise commercializing any Website material;
- Using this Website in any way that is or may be damaging to this Website;

sections.title: Your Content
content: In these Website Standard Terms and Conditions, 'Your Content' shall mean any commented text you choose to display on this Website. By commenting, you grant Strender a non-exclusive, worldwide irrevocable, sub-licensable license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate, and distribute it in any and all media.

sections.title: Limitation of liability
content: In no event shall Strender, nor any of its officers, directors and employees, be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this Website, whether such liability is under contract. Strender, including its officers, directors and employees shall not be held liable for any indirect, consequential or special liability arising out of or in any way related to your use of this Website.

sections.title: Indemnification
content: You hereby indemnify to the fullest extent Strender from and against any and/or all liabilities, costs, demands, causes of action, damages and expenses arising in any way related to your breach of any of the provisions of these Terms.

sections.title: Severability
content: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid under any applicable law, such provisions shall be deleted without affecting the remaining provisions herein.

sections.title: Variation of Terms
content: Strender is permitted to revise these Terms at any time as it sees fit, and by using this Website you are expected to review these Terms on a regular basis.

sections.title: Assignment
content: The Strender is allowed to assign, transfer, and subcontract its rights and/or obligations under these Terms without any notification. However, you are not allowed to assign, transfer, or subcontract any of your rights and/or obligations under these Terms.

sections.title: Entire Agreement
content: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between Strender and you in relation to your use of this Website and supersede all prior agreements and understandings.

sections.title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
content: These Terms will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of [Your Location], and you submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in [Your Location] for the resolution of any disputes.
